title: Who Wears Crop Tops to the Office?
description: Young employees, many of them new to office jobs, are bringing a wardrobe staple usually reserved for the weekends into the workplace.
media:credit: Ysa Pérez for The New York Times
media:description: Santina Rizzi in the Miami plastic surgery office where she works as a social media manager. “I’m not going to buy clothes specifically for my job,” she said of her fondness for wearing crop tops to work.
